recipes.name: Chocolate chip cookies
recipes.description: These classic chocolate chip cookies are soft, chewy, and loaded with rich chocolate chips. Perfect for any occasion, they’re easy to make and guaranteed to satisfy your sweet tooth!
instructions: In a bowl, mix the butter and sugar until creamy.
Add the egg and mix well.
Gradually add the flour and chocolate chips.
Form small balls and place them on a baking tray.
Gently flatten each ball with a fork (barely).
Bake for 10-15 minutes or until golden brown.

taglines: Crafted with Heat. Served with Heart.
Forging food one recipe at a time.
